name: WEB3Space
shortDescription: Provide a variety of services for Web3 ecosystems
description:
WEB3Space is a team of professional analysts and validators providing services in Web3. WEB3Space uses highly secure industry-grade infrastructure for next-generation blockchain operations. They provide a variety of services for Web3 ecosystems.

WEB 3 industry Evolution of the financial sector developmentEarn the following areas with us: Reliable and highly profitable nominate / stakingInstalling Node in the ecosystems of Ethereum, Polkadot, Kusama, Cosmos and othersAutomated selection of digital assets for purchase / sale based on 20 criteriaInvesting in startup projects with maximum allocation.
